hero.title: Together for a citizen-friendly Germany
hero.subtitle: The Citizens' Friendly Party is committed to a transparent, just, and innovative future. Join us in shaping the future of Germany.

events.title: Events
events.subtitle: Meet us in person and discuss the future of Germany with us. Here you can find all current events of the Citizens' Friendly Party.
